pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Shopcloud-Streams-CLIShopcloud Streams CLI Package thats send the events per PubSub to the streams backend where the magic happend.## Install```py$ pip install shopcloud-streams````## Usage```pyfrom shopcloud_streams import Event as StreamEventEvent("de.talk-point.streams/test_fired", {'pk' :'<pk>'}).fire()```## Develop```sh$ pytest```## Deploy to PyPi```sh$ pip3 install wheel twine$ python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel$ twine upload dist/*```
